body: Added pop up description.

Could have a little overlay at the bottom of the screen, from where you see the title, image and chapter name, and a pause button. touching the non-pause parts of it lead you to the full player screen.
With new redesign, this feature is unnecessary. Yes/No buttons are now present.
There isnt a next button anymore. Can add a back to the beginning button.

It should play previous question, though.
Fixed.
Change this to 'prev chapter' button on the screen (half-seen button at top left) makes it go to previously played chapter.
Back button now goes back to previous question.
Shows progressdialog. Add a progress bar for every download.
Currently waits for stories.xml to be downloaded.
